mainText:
Just wanted to say my son never met Steve but you would swear they were best
friends!!  Charles is a 3rd year student at UVA and during his freshman year
in high school, he fell in love with Steve's passion.  We, as a family, would
talk about Apple and Steve around the dinner table.  Steve was my son's hero
because he proved as long as you really loved what you do and had the desire
for all to win......Success was inevitable.   Steve's passion was contagious
and therefore, he will live on in the hearts of all of us.  What an
inspiration for a kid now in college!  Hopefully, my son will follow in
Steve's "heartsteps".

With much love and joy!
author: Donna
